overview: Based on a song by Sheila Houlahan, but reworked and re-recorded to include her poetry, KEEP ON is a story about connection and belonging -- not with others, but with ourselves.  What do you wish you tell your younger self?  How would you hold them, that person who seems both so far away and so close?  How would you convince them that they're not defined by their pain?  Keep caring, keep feeling, keep fighting -- #keepon.
title: Keep On
